narrative:
This Focused Inspection was conducted to follow-up on the female sheep (Mary Ann) that was cited during the
routine inspection of 3 March 2016.  This citation has been corrected.
The inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative, Dr. Margaret Shaver, VMO and
Kendall Lundy, ACI.
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
Additional Inspectors
Shaver Margaret, Veterinary Medical Officer
